body: From what i get the mc always loved her but she was a slut when young so the mc could not forgive her and stand it and left, after that she meet the guy that accepted her despite being a slut and marry, after the mc return maybe she realise that she love him too but he keep refusing her so she insult him and attack him for him to rape her(slut love maybe), and she want him to stay and keep fucking her, in the epilogue at the end of "HinataNtrism", they fuck again at the beach and she insult him again about he can't make her pregnant and he keep fucking her, one year later he return and she has a baby 2 month that match the time he was there, and maybe is from him, she never talk him she just look at him and smile

She one hot babe, lucky dude.

Netorare and netori are different. 
Netorare is when girl is stolen from the MC. Netori is when MC steals the girl.
True, netorare is when a character steals the loved one from their partner. Here, The girl was the one pushing onto the boy so... cheating, yes, netorare, not so much.

Honestly, this seems like Nitori to me. I keep seeing netorare where it really shouldn't be. I mean, before people jump down my throat, its not like the guy with glasses made any sort of impression to make you think hes the MC or even a central character, the guy who...gets forced? at least pushed into "making" her have an affair seems more like a main character to me, honestly I don't feel jealous rage or sadness or anything, just that somehow the girl knew what she wanted and took it and has a hubby on the side while hes not around
that ending scene has got to be the best i have ever seen
Sorry for mistakes and double one sentence. I mean "town" in "decise" i don't know why i wrote "decise" lol.
